name: bcf2-bot-bakertilly
description: BigCareerFest.Online Bot for Baker Tilly company

scripts.start: npm install && cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_PRODUCTION_PLATFORM=heroku node index.js
scripts.start:dev: set NODE_ENV=development&& set NODE_PRODUCTION_PLATFORM=localhost&& node index.js

author: Danyil Orel
